proposal.name: WEBGL_subarray_uploads

features.feature: Though no-copy slicing of TypedArrays is already possible, it can still generate considerable garbage, incuring GC load. Allowing for specification of subarray offset and size can eliminate this source of garbage.

newfun.function: Upload data from a subarray of an ArrayBuffer or SharedArrayBuffer.
